name: Babylon Holdings Limited
description: Babylon Holdings Limited is a digital health company that harnesses the power of artificial intelligence (AI) and technology to provide accessible healthcare solutions. Founded in 2013, Babylon's mission is to put an accessible and affordable health service in the hands of every person on earth. The company operates through a combination of AI-driven health assessments, virtual consultations, and digital health monitoring, which enables users to receive medical advice and support from the comfort of their homes. Babylon's innovative platform offers a range of services, including symptom checking, personalized health information, and telehealth consultations with licensed healthcare professionals. The company partners with healthcare systems and insurers to improve patient outcomes and reduce costs, ultimately transforming how healthcare is delivered. With a commitment to making healthcare more efficient and equitable, Babylon continues to expand its services globally, employing cutting-edge technology to ensure high-quality care is accessible to all.

seo.meta_title: Babylon Holdings Limited | Digital Health Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Babylon Holdings, a leader in digital health and telemedicine, providing AI-driven healthcare solutions accessible to everyone.

faq.question: What does Babylon do?
faq.answer: Babylon provides digital health services, including AI-driven health assessments and virtual consultations.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Babylon?
faq.answer: Ali Parsa is the CEO of Babylon Holdings Limited.

faq.question: Where is Babylon headquartered?
faq.answer: Babylon is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.

faq.question: What are Babylon's main services?
faq.answer: Babylon's main services include symptom checking, virtual consultations, and health monitoring.
